identified_needs.description: The patient lives alone and requires In-Home Supportive Services (IHSS).

citation.quote: The patient lives alone in a house/apartment. She has Medicare Part B only and is enrolled in a local health plan. The patient receives 156 hours and 36 minutes per month of In-Home Supportive Services (IHSS).

current_actions.description: Contacted IHSS social worker to inform them of patient’s return home and requested resumption of IHSS services.

citation.quote: SW contacted the patient’s IHSS social worker to inform them of the patient’s return home and requested the resumption of IHSS services.

identified_needs.description: The patient needs transportation for discharge.

citation.quote: A wheelchair van has been scheduled for pick-up today at 4:00 PM to transport the patient home.

current_actions.description: Scheduled a wheelchair van for pick-up today at 4:00 PM.

citation.quote: A wheelchair van has been scheduled for pick-up today at 4:00 PM to transport the patient home.

identified_needs.description: The patient needs a hospital bed and a power wheelchair.

citation.quote: The medical provider has ordered a hospital bed for the patient, with the order submitted to a healthcare supplier for fulfillment and coordination with the patient’s family member. Additionally, an order for a power wheelchair has been submitted to a local wheelchair supplier, with a request for follow-up with the patient’s primary care provider for any necessary documentation. The local wheelchair supplier reported that the patient received a power wheelchair in 2021 from another supplier.

current_actions.description: Ordered hospital bed and power wheelchair for the patient.

citation.quote: The medical provider has ordered a hospital bed for the patient, with the order submitted to a healthcare supplier for fulfillment and coordination with the patient’s family member. Additionally, an order for a power wheelchair has been submitted to a local wheelchair supplier, with a request for follow-up with the patient’s primary care provider for any necessary documentation.

identified_needs.description: APS concerns about family administering unprescribed medications to the patient.

citation.quote: SW requested the medical team provide more information regarding current APS concerns about the family administering unprescribed medications to the patient.

current_actions.description: Contacted APS worker to inform about patient's discharge plan.

citation.quote: SW also contacted Adult Protective Services (APS) to inform them of the patient’s discharge plan and left a voice message.

planned_actions.description: Medical team to clarify the situation with the family and provide more context and details about the medications.

citation.quote: The medical team will clarify the situation with the family and provide more context and details about the medications.

relevant_resources.name: Substance Use Resources: Healthier Habits/Safer Use

summary.overall_status: The patient has multiple ongoing social needs including housing, transportation, medical equipment, and APS concerns. Actions are in progress to address these needs.
